prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Large language models, such as GPT and Claude, are identified as the key technological drivers behind this transformation in human-computer interaction. This advancement is compared to the role that Moore's Law and microprocessor improvements played in previous generations of programming languages.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
